text: Ridley Burton (21 December 1893 – 28 October 1974) was an English professional footballer who played as a wing half. ==References== Category:1893 births Category:1974 deaths Category:People from Amble Category:English footballers Category:Association football wing halves Category:Seaton Delaval F.C. players Category:Newcastle City F.C. players Category:Grimsby Town F.C. players Category:West Stanley F.C. players Category:Ashington A.F.C. players Category:English Football League players
title: Ridley Burton
